song.englishname: Let Us Love And Sing And Wonder

english.segment1: Let us love and sing and wonder. Let us praise the Savior's name. He has hushed the law's loud thunder. He has quenched Mt. Sinai's flame
english.segment2: Let us love the Lord who bought us. Pitied us when enemies. Called us by His grace and taught us. Gave us ears and gave us eyes
english.segment3: He has washed us with His blood. He has washed us with His blood. He has washed us with His blood. He presents our souls to God
english.segment4: Let us wonder grace and justice. Join and point to mercy's store. When through grace in Christ our trust is. Justice smiles and asks no more
english.segment5: He who washed us with his blood. He who washed us with his blood. He who washed us with his blood. Has secured our way to God
english.segment6: Let us praise and join the chorus. Of the saints enthroned on high. Here they trusted him before us. Now their praises fill the sky
english.segment7: He has washed us with his blood. He has washed us with his blood. He has washed us with his blood. He has washed us with his blood. He will bring us home to God
english.segment8: Based on a hymn by John Newton (1725-1807)
